titleStmt.title: John B. Norton et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG8727

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Lexington Ky March 16" 1863
To His Excellency The Governor of Ky

The undersigned Petitioners would most respectfully ask the remission of a fine of $150 -- imposed upon Wm Alvers at the June Term of the Fay. Circuit Court 1862 -- Upon said Judgment, execution issued agst sd Alvers of Littleton Stewart as his Surety, which said sum, if made at all, will be paid by said Surety, in whose behalf, we ask this form of the executive clemency --

Jno B Norton C f c c
J R Gross
Chas S Bodley Shff F. C.
Thos D Carr
Refer to W. S. Downing Esqr

Fayett Cir Ct
Fine Reitted
J F Robinson
$150
Wm Alvers
Issd June 23. 1863
